content: X-CC MX GA Ceiling clip with wire Metal ceiling clip with preassembled wire for light-duty mechanical/electrical fastenings on ceilings and use with collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Friction-fit in the nose of BX/GX/DX nailers for easy handling Virtually dust-free fastening Quick, cost-efficient fastening Applications Light-duty fastenings on ceilings Not suitable for suspended ceilings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Acoustic ceiling Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 120, GX 3 Technical Data | Application | Acoustic ceiling | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 120, GX 3 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Steel | Approvals | N/A | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 Âµm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 421821 - Ceiling clip w/wire X-CC MX 6 12GA - Package Size 100 pc - 421822 - Ceiling clip w/wire X-CC MX 8 12GA - Package Size 100 pc - 421823 - Ceiling clip w/wire X-CC MX 10 12GA - Package Size 100 pc - 421824 - Ceiling clip w/wire X-CC MX 12 12GA - Package Size 100 pc
